entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:11 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 11:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.2°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -10.1°C
Wind: SSW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late in the evening then partly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls early in the evening. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
